file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-26-06-04 - COCKPIT STEP LIGHT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL COCKPIT STEP LIGHT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures for the removal/installation of the cockpit step light. B. The cockpit step light is installed in the entrance of the cockpit, zones 231 and 232. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 33-26-06-000-801-A COCKPIT STEP LIGHT - REMOVAL ALL 33-26-06-400-801-A COCKPIT STEP LIGHT - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-26-06 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-26-06-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. COCKPIT STEP LIGHT - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the cockpit step light. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the Task Entrance of the cockpit I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the entrance panel, make sure that the COURTESY LTS switch is set at OFF. (2) Remove access panel 231 AF (AMM MPP 06-41-02/100). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) To remove the cockpit step light with protective cover, do these steps: (a) Disconnect the two electrical connections (8). (b) Disconnect the electrical connector (7). (c) Remove and discard the tiedown strap which attaches the cables to the step. (d) Remove the two screws (6), two washers (3), two lock washers (2), and two nuts (1) which attach the box (4) and the lens (5) to the step. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-26-06 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (e) Remove the lens (5). (f) Remove the box (4). (2) To remove the cockpit step light without protective cover, do these steps: (a) Disconnect the two electrical connections (9). (b) Disconnect the electrical connector (8). (c) Remove and discard the tiedown strap which attaches the cables to the step. (d) Remove the two screws (7), two washers (3), two lock washers (2), and two nuts (1) which attach the box (4) and the lens (6) to the step. (e) Remove the lens (6) and the gasket (5). (f) Remove the box (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-26-06 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Cockpit Step Light - Removal/Installation Figure 401 DET. A A 1. NUT(2) 2. LOCK WASHER (2) 3. WASHER(2) 4. BOX PARTITION (REF.) 1 B 5. LENS 6. SCREW(2) 8. ELECTRICAL CONNECTION PCB ASSY DET. B 1. NUT(2) 7.ELECTRICAL 2. LOCK WASHER (2) CONNECTOR 3. WASHER(2) 4. BOX PARTITION (REF.) 5. GASKET 2 6. LENS 7. SCREW(2) 1 9. ELECTRICAL PCB CONNECTION ASSY DET. B 8.ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 1 STEP LIGHT WITH PROTECTIVE COVER 2 STEP LIGHT WITHOUT PROTECTIVE COVER 145AMM330196.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-26-06 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-26-06-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. COCKPIT STEP LIGHT - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the cockpit step light. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 - MIL-S-23190 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expendable Parts IPC REFERENCE ITEM QTY (VENDOR REFERENCE) Tiedown strap MIL-S-23190 1 H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Entrance of the cockpit I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) To install the cockpit step light with protective cover, do these steps: (a) Put the lens (5) and box (4) in position. (b) Tighten the two screws (6), two washers (3), two lock washers (2), and two nuts (1) which attach the box (4) and the lens (5) to the step. (c) Make the electrical connection (8) back. (d) Connect the electrical connector (7) back. (e) Install the new tiedown strap which attaches the cables to the step. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-26-06 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) To install the cockpit step light without protective cover, do these steps: (a) Put the lens (6), gasket (5), and box (4) in position. (b) Tighten the two screws (7), two washers (3), two lock washers (2), and two nuts (1) which attach the box (4) and the lens (6) to the step. (c) Make the electrical connection (9) back. (d) Connect the electrical connector (8) back. (e) Install the new tiedown strap which attaches the cables to the step. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install access panel 231 AF (AMM MPP 06-41-02/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-26-06 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
